com.pstreets.game.battlecity
Class ResourceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.pstreets.game.battlecity.ResourceManager

public class ResourceManager
extends java.lang.Object

Resource Manager.A Singleton class used to mananger images and wav/midi resources.

1.00, 12/08/10
